history.text: Adopted a new ordinance titled the “Room Tax Ordinance”. Prior to publication, the Room Tax Ordinance was numbered as Chapter TAX.02 of Stockbridge-Munsee Tribal Law and internal references were updated accordingly.

annotations.annotation: Adopted a new ordinance titled the “Room Tax Ordinance”. Prior to publication, the Room Tax Ordinance was numbered as Chapter 57-A of Stockbridge-Munsee Tribal Law and internal references were updated accordingly.
